doc.title: Diabetes: An Integrated Approach
doc.plot: Visionhealth was created in 2005 with the specific goal of collecting the highest quality and the most detailed information available on incredibly widespread chronic ailments and making it available to sufferers worldwide. A portion of all sales of Visionheath DVDs for perpetuity will go to research and charitable foundations directly related to the illnesses covered. "DIABETES an integrated approach" explores orthodox methodologies and some powerful and efficacious alternatives including - acupuncture, nutritional medicine, chi gung, herbal medicine, provocation neutralization, breathing, massage, yoga, meditation, homeopathy, kairos, bi-aura and more. Featuring some of the worlds foremost experts, topics covered include: diet, exercise, stress, the candida yeast problem, organic food, the emotions and nutrition.
